title: Ep. #14 | AILEE, EXO's BAEKHYUN, HEIZE, and MELOMANCE
description:
Welcome back! So much to share and discuss! We cover Ailee’s long awaited comeback album, EXO Baekhyun’s solo debut, Heize’s new hit “We Don’t Talk Together” which was produced by Suga of BTS, and Melomance’s “You & I.” Eric and resident jingle-provider Brian also give incredibly unqualified and poorly researched life advice to our listeners. You’re welcome. Hope you enjoy! :) Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave us a comment, rating and/or review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Soundcloud, or YouTube. Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at www.daebakshow.com!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
